titles: Penelopes complaint: or, A mirrour for wanton minions. Taken out of Homers Odissea, and written in English verse, by Peter Colse
author: Colse, Peter.
Homer. Odyssey.
Dorrell, Hadrian. Willobie his avisa.
publisher: Printed by [Valentine Simmes for] H. Iackson dwelling in Fleetstreet, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Temple-barre gate,
notes: In fact original verses by Colse based on events in the Odyssey.
An imitation of: Dorrell, Hadrian.  Willobie his avisa.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
